sentence.Network_en: He finished his dessert and patted his paunch.
sentence.Network_cn: 他吃完甜点，拍了拍他的大肚子。

sentence.Network_en: His once lean figure was developing a paunch.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不像以前那么瘦削，开始长啤酒肚了。

sentence.Network_en: Mr. Stryver laughed till he shook his precocious paunch.
sentence.Network_cn: 斯特莱佛先生哈哈大笑,笑得他过早出现的大肚子直抖.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French pa(u)nche, based on Latin pantex, pantic-, usually in the plural in the sense 'intestines'

entry.def: If a man has a paunch, he has a fat stomach.

example.ex: He finished his dessert and patted his paunch...
example.tran: 他吃完甜点，拍了拍他的大肚子。

example.ex: His once lean figure was developing a paunch.
example.tran: 他不像以前那么瘦削，开始长啤酒肚了。
